div.p: Enter the name you will like your team to be called. E.g. if you choose Caledonia, your team will be referred to as Team CALEDONIA from University of Buea, Cameroon or Team CALEDONIA from AnglogoldAshanti, South Africa.

div.h3: Maximum team size is 3. You can invite them here.
div.h4: Members added and their details will display underneath.
